markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Bounty Hunter](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3515)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bounty hunters are constantly on the move, whether within city walls or the wilderness, trailing their fugitive quarries for capture... or disposal. Often relying on stealth or deception as much as martial skill, bounty hunters employ a vast array of talents to accomplish their goals and collect the hefty payout.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Bounty_Hunter.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Bounty Hunter](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3515)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 82

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +10, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [Falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18), [simple manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [studded leather](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 60

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
falchion +13 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d10+6 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +14 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Hunt Prey** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The bounty hunter designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're [Tracking](/Actions.aspx?ID=2408) or [Gathering Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=2391) about, as their prey. The bounty hunter gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301) the prey, to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) checks to Track the prey, and to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) checks to Gather Information about the prey. This effect lasts until they use Hunt Prey again.

**Running Reload** <actions string="Single Action" />  The bounty hunter Stride, Steps, or [Sneaks](/Actions.aspx?ID=2405), and then Interacts to reload.

**Precision Edge**   The first time the bounty hunter hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage.

**Posse's Edge**   The bounty hunter and their allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus on initiative rolls if the opposing side includes their hunted prey.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-542" />
name: Bounty Hunter

Often relying on stealth or deception as much as martial skill, bounty hunters employ a vast array of talents to accomplish their goals and collect the hefty payout. The bounty hunter gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek the prey, to Survival checks to Track the prey, and to Diplomacy checks to Gather Information about the prey. This effect lasts until they use Hunt Prey again. Running Reload Single Action The bounty hunter Stride, Steps, or Sneaks, and then Interacts to reload. Precision Edge The first time the bounty hunter hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage. Posse's Edge The bounty hunter and their allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus on initiative rolls if the opposing side includes their hunted prey.
